I discovered music by playing with my mo: I discovered music by playing with my mother's old vertical piano when I still was a toddler. I fell in love with it at the age of 11 and, from then on, I have never left it.
Here is an overview of my musical activi: Here is an overview of my musical activities.
piping_2: Live music to make every moment unique
piping_5: I perform at weddings, funerals, religious ceremonies, official celebrations and special occasions. Each performance is customized according to the event type and the key moments of the day.
piping_7: I am available for private events, inaugurations, historical reenactments, sporting events and corporate occasions. The sound of the bagpipes adds strong emotional and visual impact to any context.
piping_9: I offer individual online and in-person lessons for beginners and intermediate players. We work on technique, breathing, traditional repertoire, and full musical preparation.
piping_11: I hold the Piping and Drumming Qualifications Board Level 5 certification, one of the most recognized international standards for Scottish bagpipes. I have performed at numerous public, sporting, and ceremonial events both alone and in various musical formations. I am constantly studying under the guidance of my teachers Alberto Massi (PDQB Level 8) and Wilson Brown (Glasgow, National Piping Centre).
piping_13: You can find some reviews of my piping services by clicking on the button below or visiting my profile on
